An on-line evaluation system for curriculum materials development

This study presents an early stage online survey to conduct the summative evaluation of EcoVentures software.
Kahveci M. (2000). International Conference on College Teaching & Learning.
Citation

Kahveci M. (2000). An on-line evaluation system for curriculum materials development. Paper presented at the International Conference on College Teaching & Learning. Jacksonville, Florida, USA. April 12 - 15, 2000.
